!Gandi Chief Chianta: Tejakar Oroka! As a Warrior of the great Orc race and as an envoy of the honorable Lord of Flame, go now onto the battlefield and punish the renegade tribes! Bring back *20 Timak Orc heads* and *20 Tamlin Orc heads* as trophies of war! That is the least punishment these traitors deserve! Come back to me when you have collected all of the trophies!
